des: "Sugar and evaporated milk are boiled then combined with mini marshmallows, white chocolate chips, walnuts and maple flavoring in this fudge that is chilled overnight before serving."
ins: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine sugar, evaporated milk and butter.  Bring to a boil and let roll 5 minutes.  Remove from heat and quickly stir in marshmallows, white chocolate, chopped walnuts and maple flavoring.  Spread in a 9x13 inch dish.  Top with large walnut pieces, evenly spaced.  Chill 8 hours or overnight.  To serve, cut around large walnuts.
